Class AuxDri

  • java.lang.Object
    • datan.AuxDri

  • public class AuxDri
extends java.lang.Object
    A class computing the Matrix A of derivatives needed int classes LsqNon and LsqMar
    Author:
    Siegmund Brandt.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuxDri

        public AuxDri(DatanUserFunction luf,
      DatanVector t,
      DatanVector y,
      int[] list)
        Parameters:
        luf - user function which must be an extension of the abstract class DatanUserFunction.
        t - vector of controlled variables.
        y - vector of measured values.
        list - array containing the elements of a list specifying which of the n variables are fixed (list element = 0) and which are adjustable (list element = 1).

    • Method Detail

      • getMatrixOfDerivatives

        public DatanMatrix getMatrixOfDerivatives(DatanVector xin)
        Parameters:
        xin - position in n-space, where gradient is to be computed.
        Returns:
        the matrix A of derivatives.
